name: New Renaissance
description: I created this piece as a tribute to the movement. The dawn of NFTs is a paradigm shift of tremendous significance, akin to the flourishing of art created during the Renaissance, which shaped the history of art in an unprecedented way. The inquisitive and wide eyed boy, who seems like a modern incarnation of a Renaissance portrait character but is actually an avatar in the metaverse, is used here as a symbol for the community of artists and collectors in the NFT space, watching this new age coming to life with a sense of curiosity, excitement and wonder. The end result is a visual amalgamation of the old and new Renaissance, in a singular moving painting.
